title: Finding My One
description: Veronica has been to a farm a total of zero times in her life. A city girl through and through, her days as a socialite are full of shopping and parties. Her perfect world is flipped upside-down when her parents give her an ultimatum. Goodbye trust fund or hello job in the family business...beginning with relocation to a small southern town.Determined to prove herself, Veronica packs her designer bags and heads to the country, where she meets her new business partner, Shane, a gruff, stubborn, hot farmer.Veronica might be spoiled, but she is smart and wants to get the job done fast, so she can get back to her life in the city. What she didn’t expect is the pace of the country, including the dirt, funny smells and new people to grow on her. Plus, there is something about Shane that is very hard to resist.Complete opposites, are Shane and Veronica on a collision course toward disaster? Or closing the gap to finding true love….
author: Halo Roberts
